website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser HD 4.40 BT are reasonably priced, well-designed Bluetooth headphones that bass lovers are sure to enjoy.
pros: Strong audio performance with excellent bass depth and solid high frequency clarity
Nicely designed and easy to operate
cons: Sculpted sound signature not for purists

customer_reviews.title: Good value headphones but they beep all the time which can get very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and build are solid and good value for money. Controls can be a bit fiddly - the buttons have a lot give with no click feedback so hard to tell if you've pushed them. I think the engineers 'solved' this by implementing audible beeps for every 'event' (i.e. user interaction). Unfortunately, a track change on the audio device counts as an event - so when you play an album or playlist, you get an audible beep between each song (on an iphone at least). Definitely not a headset for audiophiles and I definitely would not have bought these had I know about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aldous

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is amazing. The over the ear pads are not as circular as it looks in the pictures. It seems to tpaer in as the back and front to form an 0 as apposed to an O. This is an issure for my son who I bought them for but he is slowly accepting how small that makes the opening for the ear to fit in. His last pair of this brand has more room as it is more rounded. They connect easily and are of really goon quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price overall. Battery life is good, can't say I've timed it but usually lasts 2-3 days of intermittent use whilst I'm at work before another charge is required - so I'd say the quoted battery life is probably bang on (bluetooth connection) The headphones are comfy and can be worn for relatively long periods, although those with large ears might fine the cups restrictive. Build quality is standard Sennheiser and nobody can complain when paying this amount Sound is acceptable, was expecting more in the low end - but a tweak to the equalizer on your device sorts this right out. The rest of the frequency range is nice without any uncomfortable spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsall

customer_reviews.title: just awesome..
customer_reviews.text: just awesome ... I'm a huge Sennheiser fan and have been for years. These are as good as most noise cancelling headphones, super comfortable fold neatly and the sound - so, so rich and detailed ... got these for my kids, my mum recently tried them and loved them so much she ended up getting a set for herself. Battery life really good, suggested 25 hours which I think is accurate . and if you run out of juice you can plug them in via a supplied cable to continue wired listening ... you do lose all the music controls and volume on the headphones, and cannot charge and listen simultaneously. Charging quick and via micro usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Fiddly and Difficult to Pair and The Sound is Muddy.
customer_reviews.text: I've missed the return window on these, so will soldier on, but already I hate them. The on/off switch is not responsive. It's difficult to know whether they're on or off because nothing seems to light up. I've charged these up for so long I could possibly have run a small country on the power used, but can I get the damn things to pair with anything? And then finally, they decide to pair and I can get sound, only to find they're nowhere near as good as the other Sennheiser headphones I own (which cost £20).
customer_reviews.author: Trapeze Alice

customer_reviews.title: Constant Drops, Sounds awful, lags, dont believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: These are a sore sad disappointment. I got these for my GF to use with her PC while doing arts and crafts, hands free, and awesome. After 3 different dongles, and a pci card test we have come to the end of our patience. They are a few days out of missing an easy return, but i'll be emailing Amazon about it. They constantly lag, disconnect randomly and are NOT fit for purpose for a PC connection. They seem ok with a phone, but using the laptop, or either our pcs, they are a shambles. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Annoying beepage
customer_reviews.text: Good points - quality of construction and materials, sound quality, good fit over ear Bad points - not supported by latest Sennheiser app. Biggest issue and reason I sent mine back for a refund - really annoying beep when used with iPhone whenever changing volume and between every track. Not conducive to relaxed listening in any way. Sennheiser support said it was to do with phasing of volume between headphones and iPhone, tried to suggest a technique to phase but it didn't work and there's no way I'm messing around with this every time I use them. Not fit for my purpose I'm afraid and I'm surprised at a quality brand still selling a product with this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi F

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I’ve ever had. I have a ear piercing so I found out that on-ear headphones are not for me, they were making my piercing always infected and were painful after a few minutes. With these headphones I don’t feel any pain at all, the sound is perfect, not too high. I’ve read people complaining about the beep that you hear every time you press a button but honestly it’s not that annoying. They block me out completely from the world, when I go to the tube I barely hear a sound from outside. The only thing I found annoying is the British accent of the voice announcing the power on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but sound could be better
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work very well. They are comfortable and battery lasts for a very long time. The biggest downside for me is that the sound doesn't feel as surround as other over-the-ear headphones. The volume works well but it feels more like loud sounds in my ear than a full great sound. The other thing is that I haven't been able to connect them using the bluetooth to my laptop, but it works perfectly fine with my phone. Pros: - Very comfortable and light - Long lasting battery - Good range from device Cons - The sound isn't the best. - They come only with a bag so they can damage if you don't buy a hard case
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound quality but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is quite impressive and Bluetooth connection works very well with no drop outs. Battery life appears to be good too. Volume level good. The headphones fit on top of ears and not around them and therefore become uncomfortable, particularly if worn for longer periods. Extending the head band helps from a comfort perspective. Mainly will use if commuting or walking dog. Controls super easy. I don’t get any annoying beeps when switching tracks when using with iPod nano. Generally quite impressed. The bag supplied offers no protection so perhaps it’s worth considering a storage case. Update - Despite all the positives, they’re too uncomfortable, so have since returned them and opted for the Sony WH-CH700N instead.
customer_reviews.author: mr maurice l davies

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, GREAT battery life, poor build!
customer_reviews.text: These Sennheisers are very comfy, the sound is great particularly if you have an EQ to adjust to your taste. The battery life is awesome, I tend to use these about 1 to 2 hours a day and one charge lasts me a week, I charge them on a Sunday and they last all week, in fact, they've never run out of power, I just plug them in on a Sunday ready for the week ahead! One of the ear pads came off and was a sod to put back on, I super glued it back on as I couldn't be bothered with the hassle of returning and ordering another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jim The Tyreman

customer_reviews.title: Talks to you a lot
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones - comfortable - good battery life - has an annoying tendency to speak to you at stupid times - if you turn if off it says "power off" if you turn it on it says "power on". If it's running low on battery it beeps repeatedly - if you change volume it beeps - I would really prefer if my headphones did not verbalise what I'm doing especially if it's late at night and other people are sleeping :)
customer_reviews.author: Karizma Jill

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present and we'll loved by the young female recipient. Who says beautifully light weight easy to charge and connect to the iPhone tablet or TV. Sound quality so good with hardly any background noise believed these to be noise cancellation enabled hence 1 the one 🌟 score even when they are not. Charge lasts for ages and really quick to charge when they finally do go flat. Would have liked them in pink but went for quality over colour as they already have style, design and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jbone

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great listening, noise not cancelled.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good except for noise cancellation. The sounds around are dampened at best but not cancelled. Only few headphones I've tried on actually cancel noise. That feature is always reflected in the price With medium range ones like these the noise seems to be cancelled but only at the first moment because of the contrast. Once your ears readjust, in less than a minute, the noise is still very hearable, and interfering.
customer_reviews.author: Mina W. Wardakhan

customer_reviews.title: Beeping was just too much
customer_reviews.text: very nice sound, quite comfortable but not for long periods of time, but the software was garbage and annoying as the rest of the headphones is very well built. with iPhone connected via bluetooth, if you change the volume it beeps for each increment and it isn't instant, if you change apps it beeps, just very annoying unnecessary and weird. with my laptop it was much worse, disconnecting all the time and same beeping problems. its a shame tbh
customer_reviews.author: A.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed, they have great sound quality which is a given being sennheiser. The battery life is amazing, I'm very happy with how little I have to charge them. I have them Bluetoothed to my Dell laptop at work and stay connected even when I go to the printer across the hall.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is brilliant. The sound is great from about 45% and the noise cancelling is good too. I'm a bit disappointed as the photos don't show the headphones from a person's front face. Otherwise I would not have bought them, I don't like how head band leaves so much space between my head and it. Overall I still use them everyday for all the points listed at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: KAL

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with a  great price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality for the price is amazing. My brother has a pair of Bluetooth headphones which cost triple this and the sound is not as clear as this. The base on these headphones is great and when you get the app to go with the headphones you can alter the bass percentage to your preference. Only thing I would say is that although they feel quite sturdy and durable I wish the extenders on the earcups were made from metal rather than plastic just to give a bit more durability in the long term. All in all for the price of these headphones it's a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and brilliant sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is top tier, i listened to songs i've been listening to for years and heard instruments that i didn't even know were in the song until i used these. Theres also something very fishy about the battery life because they have lasted so long without a charge that i can't remember the last time i charged it (and i use these headphones daily for hours at a time). Only issue i can think of is i'd like them to be a bit louder but its not like the max volume is too low, i just like my music to be very loud. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound - excellent. Quality of product - excellent well made. Exterior noise - average, not claimed as noise cancelling. Pairing - very good, one devise I've got won't pair but others ok. Wired connection - bit fiddly as you have to push in audio cable to devise socket and then twist makes sense to keep the connection solid, maybe in time I'll get the hang of it. Overall pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D M

customer_reviews.title: Absolute nightmare to pair with a desktop.
customer_reviews.text: This product is far better served as a great set of bluetooth headphones for people who want to listen to music on their phone. They're completely impractical for use with a PC. The bluetooth constantly unpairs, making it not fit for purpose. It also seems to struggle when you pair with multiple devices. If you're looking for a set of headphones for PC use or gaming, then I would avoid these. If you want a great sounding pair of bluetooth headphones to listen to music on the train to work, then you can't do much better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and average sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Sennheiser headphones - I DJ using HD280Pro which are a great sounding and comfortable pair of headphones. Sadly the HD 4.4 BTs had a relatively poor sound by comparison, and the earcups if you are looking for a true over ear headphone are simply too small, and crush your ears if you wear them for more than 1hr. The transport controls are pretty good, similar to the Sony CH700N, and the noise canceling is better than the Sony's. I had to send mine back mainly because they crush your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Scott MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bluetooth headset. Very happy with purchase. Light, compared to some. Which I appreciate. Good sound quality and easy to use Only negative comment, that the head set constantly states fully charged on phone display. Though been used all week. An hour a day on average! But all in all good price and good product. Would recomend
customer_reviews.author: argkrg

customer_reviews.title: Beast Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones in every aspect. Pretty good noise cancellation and isolation, high and bass is decent and they are quite loud too. One can only complain about the mic which is fairly terrible to say the least, hence the four star review. If you depend on it for phone calls, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Georgios Rovolis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones great sound I use them as gym headphones and they stay on no trouble highly recommended. Have used them for films too and again very good sound. Just need to buy a case for them like I did
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and noise cancelling!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have purchased these over any other brand. Excellent clarity and can't hear a thing outside the headphones with the nose cancelling when musics on. Amazing having wireless only thing is it seems to only allow me to connect to one device ie my phone and if i try to connect to my tablet it wont allow me... i probably have to configure but i would have hoped it would be a bit easier as with most other bluetooth devices... doesn't change anything for me though i still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had to give one star for noise cancelling, as these headphones don’t have noise cancelling. They are a good quailty pair of headphones for the price, and I have been able to listen to these for good lengths of time without them causing listening fatigue, usually I only find that with much more expensive (£400+) studio headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian D.

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. And how the hell did they make the calling feature better sound quality than anything I've ever used. I was out in the serious wind and my son said the call quality was perfect in fact he didn't believe me that I was out in serious wind weather. He thought I was inside at home. I love these. Best ever wireless headphones I've owned. Cannot say anything bad. Also not sure if they are water proof. But I've had these very wet from rains a few times and not a issue.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, worth more than they are sold for
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for several months. Good build quality, I haven’t been especially careful with it and it still looks brand new with no scratches etc. Sound is excellent quality for the price. Pretty good sound insulation. Mic only works over Bluetooth and isn’t great quality, not noticeable over phone calls but it is over voip. I have used it frequently since I bought it around 4 months ago and have charged it 3 times so battery is good. I see lots of reviews saying it has a small ear cup but I haven’t found it an issue and I would consider my ears to be quite big.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Brews

customer_reviews.title: Don't procrastinate,  just get them - good value and great sound from a good brand
customer_reviews.text: Really great headphones, and superb service from Amazon ordered late at night and delivered mid-morning. Can see how some people find controls bit awkward, but only just got today and already got to grips with them. Really happy. Uhmed and Ahhed over buying these for a while, really should have ordered ages ago, really are well made, with better sound than others have.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: They replaced old Sony headphones which were good quality. Sound is fine, light enough and adjust sufficiently to suit most people. Some are animated re the bleep. Not really a major issue [ it`s a small bleep] & handy to advise the end of music passages that fade to silence. There would have to be a substantial quality need to go higher, in price.. I`m happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alrid

customer_reviews.title: Love em but would not pair..
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable Head Phones in the world and fantastic sounds. However, would only connect to my S5 and not my Tablet or partners S6... Returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound. Comfortable Earpads but they could be more ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound. Comfortable Earpads but they could be more breathable, ears a little bit sweaty when using longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this to see if these headphones were as good as the reviews said. I have to say... They are! Really comfortable to wear, sound quality is good and even though they are not actively noise cancelling, the ear cover does the trick! Don't think you can find something better at this price.
customer_reviews.author: eleonora busia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good value.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good sound quality. The only downside is they cannot be used if they have run out of charge. They can be plugged in but still need charge to work. The cushioning on the cups is wide adding to the comfort, but the ear holes are of average size so may not be good for people with large ears. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: good headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these blue-tooth headphones also seem well build for my Autistic son to block out the noise while at college,he likes to watching Movies and doctor who on his phone etc., he had Scull Candy Dash 2 which broke after a few years of hard use......he much prefers these and says that it blocks a lot outside the ear noise.....so one happy bunny...
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good for price. Feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly.mine came smelling of fish, no idea why but Amazon gave me a partial refund for it. The actual quality of the sound etc I'd good but not great. It sounds a little like you are underwater at times. Build quality however is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Stevey N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect overall
customer_reviews.text: Amazing overall battery life is amazing Few usage notes If you wear glasses after time a long duration your ears can hurt The foam is like memory foam so hugs the ear Sound and quality is fantastic very easy to link
customer_reviews.author: Quantummodz

customer_reviews.title: Annoying beeps for anything
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound But annoying Beeps for anything! Volume, play and stop, skip track, Gif frames!!!, really is super annoying, I’m thinking to ask for a refound because is stressing and you can’t get rid of beeps
customer_reviews.author: antoniofunaroph

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent (good for the price), earcups bit small so can touch ears when you have bigger ears. Headphones are lightweight, sometimes hurt a bit on top of my head but only after hours of usage. Would have liked to see a better cable quality for the times I need to use a cable. NC is not advertised and does an ok job when listening to music (it blocks most of the outside noise inside a factory)
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Not bad pair of headphones, it doesn't have noise cancellation, so you can hear what's going on around you but not very loudly. Works with all devices and as I have hearing problem a great substitute for in-ear headphones
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H. Rakhra

customer_reviews.title: Overall great pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, despite it being made of silicon and plastic it feels really sturdy. Base leaves a little bit to be desired but it is still satisfing for most people I would say. Great clarity in these headphones and the cushioning in the ear cups are very comfortable. Does a good job of blocking out noise despite not having noise cancelation. Only thing I would like to change is to have a little bit more base, but that’s just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Sound anazing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality blew me away, it is above and beyond my expectations for the price range. Really comfortable, pretty good noise cancelling and all round my favourite Amazon buy ever. I wear these almost every day since I bought them and the battery life and bluetooth range is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Don’t focus on the expensive brands just because of the name! these are better!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical about buying these with the price being a lot lower compared to the 4.50 edition. The sound quality on these are brilliant , and so comfortable to wear I don’t even realise I’m wearing them . My partner has the noise cancellation beat headphones that are worth £300 and these are equally as good . I can’t complain about anything apart from the fact it would be nice if it came with a case to put them in . I highly recommend these headphones you won’t regret !
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfort and great sound!
customer_reviews.text: After trying out loads of different headphones in this price bracket, these are the best, hands down! Love the feel of them on, the memory foam cups are soo comfy and block out enough sounds that I didn't feel the need for noise canceling! Easily paired with my big tv. No latency (unless I put 2 walls between them and the sound source as would be expected!) Solid quality build and feel and sound is really great with plenty of volume if you want lots!
customer_reviews.author: JackieMc

customer_reviews.title: I like music even more now
customer_reviews.text: Had a cheap pair before but I'm glad I spent a bit more now. They seem very durable,the sound quality is amazing, connect quickly without any disruption, very handy control buttons for skipping tracks, volume and pause and when people to stop you in the street to ask for directions I can't hear them at all just see the lips moving.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. The controls are a little inaccessible with headphones on but otherwise there isn't a problem. Outside noise can be clearly heard but sound quality from the device is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Devon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So these are big, not cute but very well cushioned and great sound cancellation. Love the toggle button and the battery life is phenomenal. The carry case is chunky because of their size but keeps them in good condition. I'd recommend getting them.
customer_reviews.author: bythebuy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound output and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound with a reasonable base. Very pleasant listening to Santana and not disturbing my wife. Comfortable to wear and these headphones do have a good sound cancellation. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I quite literally use these everyday and can honestly say these are some of the most comfortable headphones I’ve worn. They have a great warm sound quality. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Craig18Hall

customer_reviews.title: headband is not comfy for long use
customer_reviews.text: first i would like to state i believe the sound quality of the headphones is great and the bluetooth works well however i found after wearing the headphones for longer than 1 hour the band began to hurt my head and i had to take them off, very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: BLeake_

customer_reviews.title: CANT FAULT IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a flight to the USA , even though it's not the noise cancelling version I must say don't waste extra money for it cause I could hear anything aside from the slight noise from the jet. Quality is good very flexible Sound is superb pairs instantly and the sound is clear and yet has a punch of deep bass. HIGHLY RECCOMEND
customer_reviews.author: YA BOI GIVING ANSWERS :)

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones for the price .
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best headphones i have ever owned . Purchased in September 2019 i have never looked back . Use them during my daily commute to uni and i can go a week without charging them . Very comfortable with regards to prolonged use and cant see myself changing them for a while . Added audio cable in case they run out of batterey when in use but so far this has not occurred for me . Would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken wore, thankfully it's wireless!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I had invested in a set of wired £30 Sennheiser and loved the experience. The wire on them broke and, being tired of having wires breaking and defaulting the entire headset, I invested in these. 3 weeks in, the wire that came with them has gone bust and a new one costs ~£15. I'm sour about that as £80 is a fair amount for headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.  Great bass.  Quantity sound.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've had. Excellent sound quality. Very comfortable. Memory foam pads . Small and compact. Sound quality is amazing with a good range of frequencies. Perfect noise cancellation..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: only had a couple of hours use since arrived but found them great sound/quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really chuffed with this buy....only had a couple of hours use since arrived but found them great sound/quality....simple quick start instructions....playing in no time at all. Paired in a jiffy with the NFC/Bluetooth ! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: IanM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Didn't have any problems
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Didn't have any problems, except the lack of proper head cushion which makes it a bit uncomfortable after extended use. 1.Update: The power button is getting stuck sometimes, now i press it more gently but the the button quality feels really bad.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: As with all Sennheiser headphones the sound quality is brilliant, especially with the 4.40's. Not to mention the battery life is outstanding it lasts approximately around 20 hours. Also the portability of the headphones is very convenient as they fold. It can be a bit difficult initially connecting it to a device but after you do they work like a charm. I fully recommend the product to anyone that's interested in bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: annette grady

customer_reviews.title: Far too quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to listen to audiobooks and podcasts on my commute, but they are too quiet and I will be returning them tomorrow. Sound quality, build and comfort are all adequate, as you'd expect from Sennheiser. But given I bought these for one very specific reason and they don't fulfil their purpose, I have to send them back. Very disappointed, especially after my last Sennheisers broke and these were their replacement.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: This model does not have noise cancelling but that being said the sound quality is tlwhat you would expect from Sennheiser. The volume could do with being a little louder but they are pretty comfortable and do exactly what I want them to do. Build quality it's pretty sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: James Doody

customer_reviews.title: The best after sales service
customer_reviews.text: Had to send these back to Sennheiser due to a charging problem,have to say,their after sales service is second to none.within days of them being returned,received a new pair from Germany.
customer_reviews.author: john webb

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son, he's very happy with them. Uses them for music and also connects them to his Xbox - he says they are better than his expensive astro headset for the Xbox! He's very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: emotink

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Loud enough to drown out most noises and good bass on them. Get a little beep every few mins when it reaches 30% battery but IV had mine a little over 2 weeks and haven't charged them yet. I use them everyday for 6-8 hours at a time. Battery life is amazing. Nothing to complain about. All in i am super happy with them and would buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: a great pair of headphone.
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable. I can listen to my music for hours and not feel any pressure on my ears and the sound quality is great. Easy to set up on my phone but be aware that if you want it to work on your laptop, like i did, you will need to buy a separate Bluetooth adapter and connect that to your laptop to get it working (for both Windows and Linux OS)
customer_reviews.author: MR O A ADEBARI

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, very comfortable and the battery lasts forever. They can be a little fiddly to connect to another device after the first set up but other than that they work great.
customer_reviews.author: JRev

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with these headphones. I use them for listening to music at work and the sound is crisp and clear. Also brought them on a trip to America - they're excellent on Airplanes as they block out a lot of the background noise so you can actually hear the movie. No need to spend the extra money on sound cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and of good quality. Quite lightweight and seem to have a noise cancelling effect. Battery is lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mick H

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality making it worth every penny, have owned this pair for just shy of a month and can safely say the headphones have died 3-4 times total, with moderate-heavy use of the pair. The headphones are comfortable, however they are quite large in appearance, which is a very small negative. Overall a great quality pair of headphones and certainly worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Craig

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Good Sound. Fiddly controls. Unclear guide sheet.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable speakers with good sound. The guide that comes with it is like an IKEA guide only less clear. It took a while to realise that you needed to hold the power on button for 5 seconds to get blue tooth scanning to start. I keep turning the headphones off while trying.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones the sound quality is well worth what I paid. I would recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months, it has adequate noise isolation. Good volume control and baterry. Can't ask for a better product for this price range Although the earcups are not actually over-ear, maybe it's because my ears are bigger than normal. It takes sometime to break in and to snuggle it around your ear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones do not work
customer_reviews.text: Headphones do not hold a charge and will only work plugged in! Supplier have said to contact Amazon or Sennheiser. Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: john rolls

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphone I've bought so far. Great sound and noise cancelling features. Highly recommend it👍👍
customer_reviews.author: R2sweet

customer_reviews.title: The really useful feature is the optional cable connection
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyable sound quality with "full body" (used for stream/compressed audio on mobile devices). Long battery life, proper ergonomics and functionality of buttons on the earphone. Built-in mic is sufficient for phone calls. The really useful feature is the optional cable connection. Earpad could be slightly bigger (in my case... likely not a problem for people with average size ears.)
customer_reviews.author: viszokicsabi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones to get the best from movies, and wow, the sound quality is amazing, sounds all around, and certainly enhances the enjoyment of watching a good film, or even a soap!!
customer_reviews.author: Allan C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Spent six hours listening to music non-stop when I first got this thing. It's bliss. I found it very comfortable for that whole time. It's going to be a great tool for my studying. Battery life is good but I find the battery life percentage displayed on my phone to be very inaccurate. After 60% it plummets. 60% is more like 15% or 20%.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lewis

customer_reviews.title: so quiet, onoise leakage - returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned these as i couldnt hear podcasts in my kitchen - there would have neen no chance onthe tube or train Also when i turned up loud eveyone else could hear
customer_reviews.author: A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: this causes headaches. other than that, the sound quality is very good. It completely prevents the noise from outside with the ear. A little heavy device. They put batteries all over for a long charge. I think that's why it's heavy.
customer_reviews.author: RoniUK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible connection
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones for myself and I am terribly disappointed. The blue tooth connection keeps knocking on and off and the sound is constantly disrupted. It's like there is Morse code in the background constantly. I have unfortunately thrown the box out so I don't think I can get a replacement or a refund. Terribly disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is very good, as expected from sennheiser, built quality is good as well for the price, but I feel they not that loud, lack of it sometimes, more often then not I get that : is that all you can do..? It might be just my hearing or whatever, just try them in an airport shops or something (p. s. Won't fit big ears)
customer_reviews.author: Simas Zakaras

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: little difficult to work out how to use controls and when we did interpret we could not match the lights to charging
customer_reviews.author: David J Higham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I found the bass to be overpowering on these headphones and had difficulty pairing them.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Awful sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to hear the awful sound quality. Returned it and ordered the JBLs which were half the price of this one and they are 100 per cent better
customer_reviews.author: F. B

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser's Semi-Attempt
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty balanced, no complaints there. Bluetooth however, is not perfect and the headband hurts my head after longer sessions as there's no padding on it, also mic cannot be used while the audio jack is connected to the PC. Considering the competition at this price point, still a pretty good choice for a 100€ bluetooth headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Djole Ledjo

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given four stars because I have had a few times where the Bluetooth connection jumps. I also have no idea how the auxiliary connection works but that’s on me. Other than that, they’re an excellent pair of headphones. Sennheiser are a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Simon.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Stunning sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable and most providing when it comes to sound quality and have easily been the best decision i've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicalMemer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a treat to myself. Very happy with my purchase, great battery life. They come with a light cloth bag so if you travel a lot like me you might consider so kind of stronger case. Brilliant bluetooth connectivity, great range for walking around and away from your device. A recommended buy for any one considering them.
customer_reviews.author: John O'Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bass or volume but still great
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these headphones for ages now and tbh i love them, being able use them wirelessly or wired makes them very versiltile and easy to use, I would prefer a bit louder sound and more prominent bass but overall sounds really good.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Good, HQ Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a week now, and I liked them. The sound is good, they're loud, no distortions, but however I have come to the decision to return them. This is no fault of the headphones; I can't wear headphones for long as they are all like a clamp on my head. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: creamsoda

customer_reviews.title: Xx
customer_reviews.text: These are a Xmas pressie for my hubby so can’t really give a full review.my son has tested them just to see if they worked ok and said they were amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I'm having is that when Im talking to someone using it, I can hear my voice as I'm speaking, its like the microphone picks up my voice and puts it through the speakers, but its not a big deal and its annoying at all for me. Overall this is a really good headphones in all terms and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Odai Ameera

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of headphones I have personally owned
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, extremely comfortable and affordable. Only issue with these headphones is the noise canceling; loud background noises such as cars do seep through. But these aren't active noise cancelling headphones which kinda makes up for it as these were the only sounds to come through which is pretty remarkable!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: So good for the price, bought as a gift for myself. Really impressed with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones give a lovely clear sound when playing music on my iPhone. They also sit very comfortably on the head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. In that orice range it's all you need. I do enjoy the coshion pads and it's quite comfortable to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Michal T. Slomka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great sound
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the first Sennheiser headphones ive bought and they definitely won't be the last. Really pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Jane 67

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound! Very light and comfortable. My wife loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kifeto

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Present for my audiophile son. He's very happy. A good choice and the intrinsic noise cancelling from the pads render paying more for the active noise cancelling version unnecessary. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID GERARD SNEATH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very good sound and automatically sets itself up. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great, well priced, technically competent
customer_reviews.text: These, in my opinion, sound better than other similarly priced sets. The headband can cause mild discomfort after a few hours' use. Sound quality is great, some compression here and there on complex tracks. Overall these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: Sennheiser HD 4.40 BT, Over-Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Sennheiser HD 4.40 Wireless offers good quality wireless sound for every day listening on the move. The closed-back, around-ear headset features Bluetooth 4.0 and aptX compatibility to deliver true Hi-Fi sound with a satisfyingly dynamic bass. Its minimalistic design has been crafted from robust, good quality materials to meet the requirements of the street. Typical audio output ports include: 3.5mm headphone port, red and white RCA audio output ports and digital audio output (either optical or coaxial). In some instances an adapter or extra component will be needed to make the appropriate connection. For example to change a 3.5mm headphone plug to an RCA connection you would use a female 3.5mm to male RCA adapter. For example to change an analog connection (3.5mm headphone plug or red and white RCA plugs) to a digital connection (ie: optical) you would use a digital to analog decoder (like the OREI DA 34).

BOX CONTAINS
4044155204711
feature_bullets: Bluetooth 4.0 wireless with aptX for true Hi-Fi sound
NFC for fast pairing with compatible devices. Frequency response (microphone): 100 - 10, 000 Hz
Ear cup mounted call and track controls
Foldable headband design for easy storage. Li-ion Polymer Battery
